conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: வணக்கம், நான் நிதி நிறுவனத்திலிருந்து உங்கள் கடன் செலுத்துதல் பற்றி அழைக்கிறேன். உங்கள் தற்போதைய கட்டண நிலையை தயவுசெய்து கூறுங்கள்?

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: நன்றி. பிப்ரவரி 12 அன்று உங்கள் கட்டணத்திற்காக காத்திருக்கிறோம்.

ai_analysis.summary: The AI collection agent contacted the borrower regarding their overdue loan payment. The borrower committed to making the payment the day after tomorrow, further specifying the exact date as February 12th. The AI agent acknowledged and confirmed this payment arrangement.
ai_analysis.sentiment_reasoning: The borrower was cooperative, directly answered the agent's questions, and clearly committed to a payment date without any signs of frustration or evasiveness. Their tone was polite and responsive.
ai_analysis.intent_reasoning: The borrower explicitly stated their intention to make the payment and provided a specific date for it ('I will pay on February 12').

note: This is a simulated conversation for testing purposes. No actual call was made.
